title: Pecan Pie
requires: Several recipes for pie crust are in the “Desserts and Pastries < Pies” folder.  The pie crust recipe that I prefer is the one titled “Flaky Pie Dough” that uses both vegetable shortening and butter together.
ingredients: 6 ounces white or dark chocolate chips
instructions: Beat the sugar, butter, bourbon, corn syrup, salt and eggs together until they are well blended.  Stir in the chocolate chips and pecans then pour the mixture into the prepared pie crust.
Bake the pie for 40 to 50 minutes or until the center of the pie is set.
source: Pecans Plus,  Taste, The  Morning News.
